rooms.title: Witch's Hut
rooms.description: You chooses to avoid the illuminated cave and continues to walk along his path. As he continues, a huge storm forces him to take shelter in a nearby abandoned witch hut.
rooms.question: Which path will you choose?

rooms.title: Witch's Hut - Sleep
rooms.description: You sleep the night off in the witch's hut.

rooms.title: Witch's Hut - Living Room
rooms.description: You explore the living room of the witch's hut.

rooms.title: Witch's Hut - Bedroom
rooms.description: You explore the bedroom of the witch's hut.
rooms.question: You spot a finely crafted magic wand on the nightstand.

weapon.name: Magic Wand
weapon.description: A finely crafted wand made of elderwood, adorned with intricate runes. It hums with latent magical energy.

rooms.title: Witch's Hut - Basement
rooms.description: You explore the basement of the witch's hut. The air feels heavy with uncertainty. There are two doors in the room, and a rat in the corner.

choices.text: Go back to the Living Room

rooms.title: Witch's Hut - Garden
rooms.description: You explore the garden of the witch's hut.
rooms.question: Your attention is drawn to a small weathered key nestled amidst the shadows.

rooms.title: Witch's Hut - Garden - Daytime
rooms.description: You leave the witch's hut and continues on your journey.

rooms.title: Thornhill
rooms.description: Welcome to Thornhill

choices.text: Rest and heal at the Inn
Continue to the Tavern to meet Avis and progress

rooms.title: Tavern - Inn
rooms.description: You rest and heal at the Inn.

rooms.title: Tavern - Market
rooms.description: The market seems to be empty. It looks like no one can afford produce anymore.

rooms.title: Tavern - Blacksmith
rooms.description: The blacksmiths place is empty. You find a sword, laying on the ground

rooms.title: Tavern - Avis's Table
rooms.description: When You go to Tavern, you ends up sitting at the counter while waiting for your friend and meet a man named Avis. He appears stand-offish but after small-talk and buying him a drink, you begin conversation and laughing. Avis notices a dagger in your belt and realizes what he sees. Avis tells you it is not a dagger it is a key and tells him how it opens the Eternal Keep of Terraquor found on Mount Argentum. Avis insists you must go open this keep and you must leave in the morning.
rooms.question: What will you do in the Tavern?

choices.text: Stay the night and shop, then leave

rooms.title: Rivershore Docs
rooms.description: You leave Thornhill and makes his journey towards the dreary town of Rivershore.
rooms.question: Where will you go in Rivershore?

rooms.title: Rivershore Docs - Markets
rooms.description: You go to the markets.

npc.name: Matilda

dialogue.speaker: Matilda
dialogue.speech: Good day traveler! What brings you to Rivershore? What kind of supplies are you seeking?

dialogue.speaker: Player
dialogue.speech: Good day, I'm seeking unique items for a challenging quest.

dialogue.speaker: Matilda
dialogue.speech: A quest, is it? Maybe this will help. It's just a pouch, but it's lined with aloe leaves. It can soothe burns or wounds quickly.

dialogue.speaker: Player
dialogue.speech: That does seem practical. How much?

dialogue.speaker: Matilda
dialogue.speech: For a brave adventurer like yourself, it's yours for free. May it aid you on your journey!

npc.returnGreeting: Welcome back, Finnrick! Enjoy your time at the Markets.

rooms.title: Rivershore Docs - Blacksmith
rooms.description: You goe to the blacksmith in Rivershore and speaks to Alden Ironhand.
rooms.question: What will you do in the Blacksmith?

npc.name: Alden Ironhand

dialogue.speaker: Player
dialogue.speech: Good day blacksmith. I'm on a quest and in need of a reliable weapon.

dialogue.speaker: Alden Ironhand
dialogue.speech: A quest, you say? I have just the thing. This sword is balanced and sharp, forged with the finest steel. Perfect for a warrior on a quest.

dialogue.speaker: Player
dialogue.speech: It's magnificent. How much for it?

dialogue.speaker: Alden Ironhand
dialogue.speech: For someone with a cause, let's say it's a gift. May it serve you well in battle!

npc.returnGreeting: Welcome back, Finnrick! Enjoy your time at the Markets.

rooms.title: Rivershore Docs - Apothecary
rooms.description: You go to the apothecary in Rivershore and speaks to Elara.
rooms.question: What will you do in the Apothecary?

npc.name: Elara

dialogue.speaker: Player
dialogue.speech: Greetings, apothecary. I am on a quest and in need of anything you may deem useful.

dialogue.speaker: Elara
dialogue.speech: Is that so? Then I may have something just for you. This is a Potion of Strength. It'll temporarily increase your physical power. Use it wisely.

dialogue.speaker: Player
dialogue.speech: This could be a game changer. What do I owe you?

dialogue.speaker: Elara
dialogue.speech: Consider it a contribution to your noble cause. May it help you triumph!

npc.returnGreeting: Welcome back, Finnrick! Enjoy your time at the Markets.

rooms.title: Rivershore Docs
rooms.description: You speak to the fisherman, gain information about the Eternal Keep, and progress.

choices.text: Go to the Mountain Side Path

npc.name: Fisherman

dialogue.speaker: Player
dialogue.speech: Excuse me, I heard you might know something about the Eternal Keep of Terraquor.

dialogue.speaker: Fisherman
dialogue.speech: Ah, the Keep... It's not a fortress, but a sacred door, perched atop Mount Argentum. Guarded by a dark, fearsome creature.

dialogue.speaker: Player
dialogue.speech: Can you tell me how to get there?

dialogue.speaker: Fisherman
dialogue.speech: Head north out of town. Cross the Silverbridge Stream, then scale the eastern side of the mountain. The sacred door lies beyond a treacherous pass, but beware, the beast guarding it has bested many who sought the Keep's secrets.

npc.returnGreeting: Welcome back, Finnrick! Enjoy your time at the Markets.

rooms.title: Mountainside Path
rooms.description: You approach the mountain after setting north from Rivershore.

choices.text: Make the journey up Mount Argentum

rooms.title: Eternal Keep of Terraquor
rooms.description: You embark on a long and treacherous journey up the mountain where you begins to approach the Eternal Keep of Terraquor.

choices.text: Fight Dr. Towell to the Death in order to earn the coveted Eternal Keep of Terraquor.

rooms.title: Rat - Battle
rooms.description: *RAT NOISES* you translate the rat noises to mean 'You have chosen death'. Hmmm, how ominous

rooms.title: Rat - Battle
rooms.description: The rat bites your toes

rooms.title: VICTORY
rooms.description: The rat breathes its final breath. You stand tall with pride.

rooms.title: Witch's Hut - Basement
rooms.description: The rat lays there lifeless. You almost feel bad for it. Almost

rooms.title: YOU DIED
rooms.description: Failure is unacceptable
rooms.question: Refresh to start over
